com.zberman2.Pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zberman2.Pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, Duke, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook, Zack

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class describing a generic chess piece Created by Zack Berman on 9/10/2014.

    • Constructor Summary

        public Piece(int color,
             char file,
             int rank)
        Constructor for a Piece object. Sets the color and initial position
        Parameters:
        color - 0 or 1 (white or black)
        file - initial file coordinate
        rank - initial rank coordinate

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(char newFile,
                       int newRank,
                       Board board)
        Method that determines if the piece can make a valid move to location (a, b) on the board
        Parameters:
        newFile - file coordinate of new space
        newRank - rank coordinate of new space
        board - current instance of the chess board
        Returns:
        true if moving to (newFile, newRank) is valid

        rank - rank coordinate
        Returns:
